text: Kids' wisdom teeth out; felt like proper guardian then!
Chasing teens off my bus made me feel ancient!
Grumpy bus driver mornings? More like navigating an obstacle course before sunrise – dodging cyclists doing slaloms and sleepy pedestrians jumping out at crossings!
Been giving unsolicited traffic advice at parties... autopilot!
Bit mad innit? Bookshelves are prime real estate no matter your age!
